articles.title: Kamala Harris Campaigns in Arizona: A Push for the West in 2024
articles.description: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris campaigns in Arizona aiming to strengthen her presidential bid against Donald Trump. Harris, along with her running mate Tim Walz, focuses on crucial states, winning LULAC endorsement. Trump also campaigns in Montana supporting Senate candidate Tim Sheehy. Both candidates target the Latino demographic.
articles.content:
